name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses the incident of an attacker executing a PowerShell script resulting in malicious activity on the internal network.

parallel--c5a8e026-ab0d-4b6e-bd88-cf874b.name: Execute Mitigations in Parallel
parallel--c5a8e026-ab0d-4b6e-bd88-cf874b.description: Simultaneously execute actions to mitigate the threat.

action--7e8f1c4f-0e4a-4e0e-b788-79c20428.name: Kill malicious process
action--7e8f1c4f-0e4a-4e0e-b788-79c20428.description: Terminate the suspicious PowerShell script process.

action--5b0920f3-336c-4085-9183-f0f3eb1c.name: Isolate affected host
action--5b0920f3-336c-4085-9183-f0f3eb1c.description: Block network traffic from the compromised host.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) = host-22 ]; then iptables -A INPUT -s 192.168.0.22 -j DROP; fi

action--8c3cb9d8-fb72-4a62-a33d-f7956ef1.name: Scan system for additional threats
action--8c3cb9d8-fb72-4a62-a33d-f7956ef1.description: Scan the system for any further potential threats post-mitigation.

while-condition--b192878c-4da5-417e-af19.name: Scan for threats loop
while-condition--b192878c-4da5-417e-af19.description: Repeat scanning until no malware is detected.
